ME Millennium Station Elevator
The Millennium Station elevator is out of service. Customers can use South Water or Van Buren Michigan Avenue as alternate boarding stations. Updates will be provided.

ME Hazel Crest Elevator Is Out Of Service
The Hazel Crest elevator is out of service.  Customers can use Harvey or Calumet as alternate boarding stations.  Updates will be provided.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
ME Van Buren Street Station Elevator Is Out Of Service

The Van Buren Street Station elevator is out of service. Customers can use Millennium Station's South Water elevator or the McCormick Place elevator as alternate boarding stations. Updates will be provided.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
ME Ivanhoe Elevator Is Out Of Service
The Ivanhoe elevator is out of service.  Customers can use 147th Street/Sibley or 115th Street/Kensington as alternate boarding stations.  Updates will be provided.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/BNSF?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
BNSF #1200, will not operate, Mechanical Failure
BNSF inbound Train #1200, scheduled to arrive Chicago Union Station at 5:12 AM, will not operate due to Mechanical Failure. #1202 scheduled to depart Aurora at 4:29 A.M. will accommodate passengers.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/BNSF?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
BNSF Train #1201 Will Not Operate

Outbound Train #1201, scheduled to arrive Aurora at 5:33 AM, will not operate due to Mechanical Failure. #1203 scheduled to depart Chicago Union Station a at 6:05 A.M. and #1205 at 6:16 A.M. will accommodate passengers.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=0&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME - Metra Electric 103rd Station Closed - Full Reconstruction

As part of the Metra Electric Community Initiative to transform 13 stations on the district, the 103rd Street/Rosemoor station remains closed for a full reconstruction and is expected to reopen next spring. During this time, customers can use 107th Street and 95th Street/Chicago State University as alternatives. For additional information click here.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert ME - Track Construction Saturday, January 4 through Sunday, January 5

Track construction will be taking place on Saturday, January 4 through Sunday, January 5. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 30 minutes behind schedule passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes. For additional information visit metra.com/constructionnotices.

Metra Alert UP-N - Track Construction Saturday, January 1 through Sunday, January 5

Track construction will be taking place on Saturday, January 4 through Sunday, January 5. Trains may incur delays enroute up to 30 minutes behind schedule passing through the work zone. Please listen to announcements for any platform changes. For additional information visit metra.com/constructionnotices.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME - 87th street/Woodruff Station Closure Beginning December 16 - Station Rebuild Project

The 87th street/Woodruff station on the Metra Electric line will be closed beginning Monday, December 16. During this time passengers can use 83rd and 91st street stations as alternatives. This is part of the Metra Electric Community initiative to transform multiple stations on the Metra Electric District. Once completed, the station will have an enclosed ADA-accessible street-level entrance, lobby with an elevator, new stairs, headhouses, new composite deck platforms, new lighting, and signage. The station is expected to reopen in late 2025. For more information visit metra.com.
